T02TD1987E:183a-1: badzra pa da bi bhe da n'a ma /
T02TD1987E:183a-3: rdo rje'i tshig rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1987E:183a-4: gang zhig khro ba las rgyal legs pa du ma 'byung ba'i gnas //
T02TD1987E:183a-5: du: kha che 'joms bde ba rab rgyas bde chen ma he'i zhal //
T02TD1987E:183a-6: chags las rnam rgyal chags bral rab 'joms mtshan ma legs bsgrengs pa'i //
T02TD1987E:183a-7: bcom ldan 'jigs mdzad he ru ka la kun nas gus phyag 'tshal //
T02TD1987E:183a-8: gang zhig khams kyi snying po bde ba 'dzin byed dge slong chen po yin phyir dam tshig sdom pas brgyan //
T02TD1987E:183a-9: rgas pa'i 'jigs bral rnam par mdzes ldan gzugs bzang dri med gzi 'od rab rgyas yun ring bde bar 'tsho //
T02TD1987E:183a-10: rdo rje'i sku thob mtshan dpes rab brgyan lha dang lha min gnod spyi gdengs ka mkha' 'gro dbang du bsdu //
T02TD1987E:183a-11: rgyal ba'i thugs mthong dmyal ba'i 'jigs 'joms de yi mdun na rdo rje 'chang gnas gshin rje'i grong las ring //
T02TD1987E:183a-12: byang chub sems nyams mkha' 'gro'i grong khyer bye pa 'jigs 'gyur lha dang bla ma sgrub la spyan mi blta //
T02TD1987E:183a-13: bde ba spangs phyir tshul khrims 'chal gyur dam tshig las 'das thub dbang bslus pas dmyal ba'i du: kha myong //
T02TD1987E:183a-14: gzi 'od rab zad rgyud las nyer gzir phrin las nyams shing dngos grub ring gyur rgas dang 'chi bas 'joms //
T02TD1987E:183b-0: ltung ba'i bde bas ye shes mi mthong 'dod chags dbang gyur rnal 'byor lam min tshe 'dir 'bras bu 'gag / so so'i skye bo nyams phyir 'bras chang zag dang don med tshangs spyod skams gyur don @183b chung gla rtsi ngan //
T02TD1987E:183b-1: rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pa'i thig le don ldan 'gyur te mdzangs pa'i nor yin yon tan rab tu 'phel //
T02TD1987E:183b-2: sbyor lam la ni yun rings 'bad kyang skad cig gis nyams lo zla'i 'bras bu ser bas 'joms pa ltar //
T02TD1987E:183b-3: rdzas dang lam kha kha zas 'khrul 'khor rlung dang dmigs pas rang lus sna tshogs 'di 'phel bya //
T02TD1987E:183b-4: tshad med snying rje rab rgyas skyabs 'gro sems bskyed rgya chen sems dpa' gsum ldan sngon du sto bar sgom //
T02TD1987E:183b-5: rkang pa rdo rje skyil krung lag gnyis mnyam gzhag lus bsrang mgrin pa dgug cing dpung mgo legs par brkyang //
T02TD1987E:183b-6: sna rtser mig gtad phyir la rlung bud nang du bsdu dang bskyar te dgang zhing mjug tu gyen la 'phang ro rkyang //
T02TD1987E:183b-7: mi phyed phra gzugs brtan 'dzin rtog med gang ba'i dbus der 'bar ba'i aa thung la sel bya //
T02TD1987E:183b-8: me dang nyi ma lan tshva spangs la mthun pa'i zas brten thog mar rang lus bsgom bya dge ba bsngo ;
T02TD1987E:183b-9: / tsha zhing gzer zug 'thems 'chus lhags pas lus dang rtsa yin stong dang bug pa rlung me chu sa sgom /
T02TD1987E:183b-10: nam mkhar sdigs mdzub rdo rje rol pa seng ge rnam grol brkyang bskum rol stabs ri bong gyad 'dzin dang //
T02TD1987E:183b-11: ka ra na te 'khrul 'khor 'di drug mdun rgyab g-yas g-yon rdo rje gar bya drag po'i rlung gi bu //
T02TD1987E:183b-12: steng dang 'og tu blta zhing 'dug ste brtson pas 'bad na rtsa yi stobs rgyas lus kyi nad rnams 'joms //
T02TD1987E:183b-13: dbug rngam rgod 'gag bzlog 'tshub gtor ba rlung dang ngag ste g-yas g-yon mdun rgyab steng 'og bug pa sgom //
T02TD1987E:183b-14: stag mo'i skyug stangs sprul gyi bya ba bsnyengs dang rgod kyi lding thabs ri bong mchog 'gros rma bya'i mjing skor dang //
T02TD1987E:183b-15: seng ge'i sprug stangs 'khrul 'khor 'di drug ha rings hi thung h'um zhes drag pa'i rlung dang bcas te bu //
T02TD1987E:183b-16: des ni bzlog 'tshub gtor ba'i skyon spong rlung gi stobs rgyas ngag gi nad rnams 'joms par byed ;
T02TD1987E:183b-17: /'byongs 'dus ltengs pa yid kyi skyon ni nyams shing skam gyur chag dang zug rdu skyes pa thig le'i gags //
T02TD1987E:183b-18: sems ni bsdus phyir h'um gyur slar zhugs dbu mar thim ste gsang zhing 'phang bya gang 'dod yid la bsam //
T02TD1987E:184a-0: gu gul yungs kar thal chen gri khrag dug dang rus pa @184a * //
T02TD1987E:184a-1: sprang mar gcan gzan pags pa tsha ba gsum //
T02TD1987E:184a-2: 'khrul 'khor drug dang rdzas sngags dmigs pa gzung bzlog dgram ste thig le'i stobs rgyas yid kyi nad rnams 'joms //
T02TD1987E:184a-3: me phreng sdong po gtsub shing 'khor lo sum 'gyur kun khyab me yi dkyil 'khor drod kyi bogs su 'gyur ;
T02TD1987E:184a-4: / rlung gi gzhu yis me yi mda' 'phangs ham gi 'ben bcom lte ba'i snyoms 'jug yid 'phrog padma dang //
T02TD1987E:184a-5: steng 'og rlung gi 'khor lo kha sbyor 'og ma 'byed 'dzum yid kyi rig ma bde stong bogs su 'gyur //
T02TD1987E:184a-6: padma'i phreng ba til gyi mar me mthing gi rgya mtsho rlung gi pa dan gsal ba'i bogs su 'gyur ;
T02TD1987E:184a-7: / lag pa'i phyag rgyas rigs lnga'i 'khor lo gsang ba'i rdo rje zhi bas gsor te dkar bsil ri bong dbab //
T02TD1987E:184a-8: 'og rlung 'then zhing sgo gcig bsdams te gling bzhi bsdus nas rig byed sor mos lam gnyis mtshams su mnan //
T02TD1987E:184a-9: yid kyi phyag rgya yid 'ong la sems snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin g-yos pas bde stong dga' ba dang po'o //
T02TD1987E:184a-10: mchog gi gnyen po rtsol ba dor la dbang po bzlog cing lam gcig gling bzhi rtsol med mgrin pa dgug / steng dang 'og la rlung la 'dor len bya zhing chags pas mi 'phrogs ting nge 'dzin ro myang ham la gtad //
T02TD1987E:184a-11: rdo rje khu tshur gling bzhi bsdu zhing ngan 'gro'i lam dag rgya mtsho ri rab la sbyar lhun po dgug / ro 'dzin nyi zla steng phyogs thur sel gyen la 'dren cing sems dang theg le nam mkha'i dbus su gtad //
T02TD1987E:184a-12: lha dbang lhun po glang po snar 'dzin rnam 'gying rol pa rdo rje gtsug tor brgyad kyi 'dzin stangs dang //
T02TD1987E:184a-13: rtse gsum gdengs ka 'di drug hi ka dang h'um gyis steng 'og rlung gzung drag tu 'then pas bdun gyis 'drongs //
T02TD1987E:184a-14: sprugs pa gar dang seng ge rnam rol rnam 'gying gzhon nu kun spyod lha mo'i rol stabs kyis //
T02TD1987E:184a-15: ldang dang 'dug cing thams cad bskyod pas sna tshogs lus sprug rab tu gsig cing skyil krung gdan la 'phags //
T02TD1987E:184a-16: rlung dang bcas pas ro stod ro smad mgo dang dbang po yan lag bzhi ste gang 'dod rnams su dgram //
T02TD1987E:184a-17: thig le kun khyab ye shes bde chen ros gang bsgoms pas bzhi pa'i dga' ba rdo rje 'chang du 'gyur //
T02TD1987E:184b-0: sgrub 'dod slob ma theg chen rigs gyur gsang sngags la mos bla ma bzang 'dzin @184b thar pa 'dod rnams kyis //
T02TD1987E:184b-1: dang po'i don du rnam bdun dbang sbyin mchog dbang bskur la slob ma smin byas skal ldan nyid du sgrubs //
T02TD1987E:184b-2: bla ma la gus blo bzang lang tsho brtson bcas gyur na gdams pa mchog sbyin dam tshig don du bstan //
T02TD1987E:184b-3: rnal 'byor rtog bral dkar po mi nyams ting 'dzin rgyas byed kun mkhyen thob phyir thabs dang ldan pas bya //
T02TD1987E:184b-4: gang zhig dkar po mi 'dor rnal 'byor bas ni rgyal pa'i bde ba sgrub cing pho nya'i lam //
T02TD1987E:184b-5: dpal ldan 'dus pa ma lus rgyud du thub dbang rnams kyis yang dag lam du thabs 'di legs par gsungs //
T02TD1987E:184b-6: sgrub po lang tshos lus dang rtsa bzangs brtson bcas blo gros bzang ldan dbang gis rnam par smin //
T02TD1987E:184b-7: gsum pa'i dbang thob sngags dang rgyud kyi pha rol son cing bla ma'i lung gis sgrub dang skyon sel mkhas //
T02TD1987E:184b-8: dbang gi ye shes mngon du byas te rtsa dang rlung 'byongs thig le la dbang gnyen po 'dzin nus shing //
T02TD1987E:184b-9: dbang dang dkyil 'khor lha sngags rdzogs rim thabs lam mthar phyin sems nyid nges rtogs sa bcu mngon du 'gyur //
T02TD1987E:184b-10: dpal ldan rgyud mchog rgya chen bla ma'i man ngag rab zab rnams las dri med bdud rtsi'i bcud babs pas //
T02TD1987E:184b-11: thabs lam man ngag rdo rje'i tshig 'byed me tog phreng 'dzin sbas pa'i gnad 'di don yod rdo rjes phye //
T02TD1987E:184b-12: de yi dge ba mtha' yas rgya chen mi nyung des ni bde chen dbus su lhan cig skyes pas rab tu 'khyud gyur cig /'gro ba kun gyi bskal pa'i lam chen tshe 'dir bgrod de rdo rje 'chang dbang sngon du byed par shog / rgyud dang man ngag thams cad kyi don phyogs gcig tu bsdebs mtshan ma gyen 'greng thig le'i 'khrul 'khor gyi man ngag / rdo rje'i tshig rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba /
T02TD1987E:184b-13: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pandi ta aa mo gha badzras mdzad pa rdzogs so//
